DefaultReaderConfiguration.fullDescription: Collects events from Borderware (now Watchguard XCS) appliances.

file.toolTipText: Directory or path to read from

string.toolTipText: Hostname of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

integer.toolTipText: Port number of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

select.toolTipText: Data routing (normalized alerts to Manager and/or raw data to nDepth)

integer.toolTipText: Number of seconds between log reads

FastPattern.description: 8, WebTrafficAudit: web filter (Permit - URL too long)
10, WebTrafficAudit: web filter (Deny - URL too long)

FastPattern.matcher: (\d+) (\S+) /kernel: arp: ([.\d]+) is on (\S+) but got reply from ([a-f0-9:]{17}) on (\S+)

FastField.defaultValue: "$3" is on "$4" but received reply on "$6"

FastPattern.pattern: udp_relay\[\d+\]:\s+permission for \S+ \S+ to connect to \S+ \S+ denied

FastFormatter.format: ICMP CODE Destination is Administratively Prohibited
ICMP CODE Destination Unreachable for Service
ICMP CODE Redirect for Service and Network
ICMP CODE Redirect for Service and Host
ICMP CODE Alternate Address for Host
ICMP CODE Time to Live exceeded in Transit
ICMP CODE Fragment Reassembly Time Exceedee
ICMP CODE Pointer indicates the error
ICMP CODE Missing a Required Option

FastPattern.description: 24, NamingTrafficAudit: named (late CNAME in answer section)
FastPattern.matcher: (\d+) (\S+) named\[\d+\]: late CNAME in answer section for (\S+) A from \[([^]]+)\]\.(\S+).*

FastField.defaultValue: Late CNAME in answer section from "$4"

FastPattern.pattern: http client specified a non-absolute URL
